channel.title: Hits Count and IP Recorder
channel.description:
This cool PHP script will record the amount of people that visit your website and also record all the incoming IP's! :D
100% Credits to Me - I made it myself.
There's a readme.txt file with the RAR. :)
http://rapidshare.com/files/57411144/Hits_Count_and_IP_Recorder.rar.html
(BTW, function addCommas basically changes 1000 to 1,000 and 1000000 to 1,000,000, etc.)
~Z
